{{wikipedia|Sangokujin}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|さん|こく|k2=ごく|じん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
An abbreviation for {{m|ja|sc=Jpan|第三国人|tr=daisangokujin|}}. Literally "third country person", ie an individual from a third party country.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さんごくじん}}

# an individual with a foreign citizenship
# term for foreign nationals of ex-colonial countries who reside in Japan; refers in particular to those of Taiwan and Korean descent
